Spicy Chicken Livers
This is vaguely based on peri peri chicken livers
150g roasted red peppers (optional)
1-2 large onions
300g chicken liver
3 cloves garlic
Chilli sauce
20ml lemon juice
120ml full cream
Large pinch piment d'espelette
  1. Roast the red peppers if using and not already roasted
  2. Fry the onion in some oil until golden and set aside
  3. Fry the chicken livers over high heat until browned
  4. Add the garlic and a little more oil if necessary and fry gently for a minute or so, to soften but without letting it brown
  5. Add the chilli sauce and lemon juice and let bubble a bit - the lemon juice should evaporate a bit, but don't let the chilli sauce burn. How much chilli sauce will be variable depending on the sauce and who is eating.
  6. Add the onions back into the pan along with the red peppers
  7. Taste for heat
  8. Add the cream and chilli flakes and let bubble for 5 minutes or so, until the chicken Livers are cooked through
  9. Serve with white bread
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
